-MVhJS9mjdlGd_C_29TL.title: Tamagucci
-MVhJS9mjdlGd_C_29TL.description: Tamagucci is for anyone who wants to relive the glory days of the 90s and attempt to keep a digital pet alive! The user can train their pet to eat, play, train, and sleep! The user interface is a callback to the fun colors and lofi gradients of the 90s.
-MVhJS9mjdlGd_C_29TL.technologiesUsed: HTML, SCSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Bootstrap, Webpack, Version Control with Github

-MVhJYySYDH2pHgp0wwW.title: Sorting Hat
-MVhJYySYDH2pHgp0wwW.description: The sorting hat allows you to submit a name, which is then sorted into one of the four hogwarts houses. The name populates a card in the First Year Students area. The card displays the student's name, random hogwarts house, and the crest of the corresponding house. The user can expel a student, which will move that student's card into the Voldermort's Army area.
-MVhJYySYDH2pHgp0wwW.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla Javascript, Bootstrap, Version Control with Github

-MVhJYySYDH2pHgp0wwX.title: Practically Pinterest
-MVhJYySYDH2pHgp0wwX.description: Want to keep track of the interesting things you've found on the internet, and organize them into boards? Want to see what other users are saving too? Try Practically Pinterest!
-MVhJYySYDH2pHgp0wwX.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla Javascript, Postman, Firebase, Webpack, Bootstrap, Version Control with Github
